text: Mhombwe yechirume hairoori umwe kusarawo kwemhombwe yechikadzi kana uyo asingatendi (anosanganisa Allah nezvimwe mukuvanamata). Uye mhombwe yechikadzi hairoorwi kusara kwekuti yaroorwa nemhombwe yechirume kana uyo asingatendi. Uye izvi (kuroora mhombwe) zvinorambidzwa kune avo vanotenda (muIslaam)
